title: Disney Tees Up New ‘Mickey Golf’ Collection for Adults: Shop the Pieces Here
description: Golf has been part of Disney’s DNA ever since the Mouse House’s Magnolia Golf Course opened on the same day as the Magic Kingdom in 1971. Disney how has four golf courses in Orlando, with the PGA Tour having hosted tournaments at Magnolia and Disney’s Lake Buenta Vista Golf Course over the years. Now, Disney […]
author: Tim Chan
excerpt: Disney unveils new golf merch for Mickey fans, including adult polos, sweaters and outerwear fit for the green or for everyday wear. Shop it here.
text: If you purchase an independently reviewed product or service through a link on our website, Variety may receive an affiliate commission. Golf has been part of Disney‘s DNA ever since the Mouse House’s Magnolia Golf Course opened on the same day as the Magic Kingdom in 1971. Disney how has four golf courses in Orlando, with the PGA Tour having hosted tournaments at Magnolia and Disney’s Lake Buenta Vista Golf Course over the years. Now, Disney is unveiling some new merch for Mickey fans, whether you’re wearing it on the green, on your travels or even to the office. Disney’s new Mickey Golf collection features apparel designed for the links but stylish enough to incorporate into your daily wardrobe. Part of the Disney Style Golf Collection, the new lineup includes shirts, sweaters and outerwear for adults, in sizes small to 3XL. We’ve rounded up some of the best Mickey Golf collection pieces below. Worth noting: many of the pieces are selling quickly online, so we recommend adding to cart while your size is still in stock. Mickey Mouse and Friends Golf Polo Shirt This polo shirt features a retro-style print of Mickey, Donald Duck, Goofy and Pluto playing golf. We like the green and navy trim around the cuffs and collar, as well as the comfortable cotton blend material, which includes a touch of elastane for stretch. It’s flexible enough to wear as you tee off, but pulled together enough to wear to dinner too. Mickey Mouse Plaid Golf Shorts These relaxed fit golf shorts feature an all-over plaid design and a Mickey “M” crest on the sides. Look closely and you’ll see tiny Mickey logos baked into the green and navy print. These shorts also feature a perforated, breathable material, elastic waistband and interior lining, making them great for all sports — not just golf. Mickey Mouse Argyle Golf Vest We love this vintage-inspired argyle vest, which features tiny Mickey faces interwoven into the classic diamond-check pattern. An embroidered Mickey appliqué sits on the on chest. The striped trim on the collar, arm holes and hem adds a touch of prep. Donald Duck Woven Golf Shirt This Donald Duck golf shirt is made from a lightweight and breathable viscose material that sits silky smooth against the skin. The front features Donald ready for a game of golf, while the back reveals a slightly more agitated Donald yelling out ‘Aw phooey!” as he breaks his golf club while teeing off. Mickey Mouse and Friends Plaid Golf Zip Jacket Stay warm during early mornings (and late evenings) on the green with this Mickey and Friends golf jacket. It features the same plaid pattern as the shorts above, with an appliqué on the chest of Mickey and Pluto playing golf. Other nods to Disney abound, with a Mickey patch on the right sleeve and a tiny Mickey golf crest tag on bottom hem. Mickey Mouse and Friends Golf Pullover Sweatshirt This Mickey Golf sweatshirt features a ton of Disney characters and motifs, with Mickey, Donald, Goofy, and Pluto represented on the front. We like the old-school design, which is reminiscent of classic clubhouse uniforms and private school pullovers. This one is selling out, so add to cart while it’s still in stock! The latest Disney drop also includes a special 75th anniversary Cinderella collection, and new merch from beloved franchises like Winnie the Pooh, Minnie Mouse and Moana. See the latest arrivals at DisneyStore.com.
html:
If you purchase an independently reviewed product or service through a link on our website, Variety may receive an affiliate commission.

Golf has been part of Disney‘s DNA ever since the Mouse House’s Magnolia Golf Course opened on the same day as the Magic Kingdom in 1971. Disney how has four golf courses in Orlando, with the PGA Tour having hosted tournaments at Magnolia and Disney’s Lake Buenta Vista Golf Course over the years.

Now, Disney is unveiling some new merch for Mickey fans, whether you’re wearing it on the green, on your travels or even to the office. Disney’s new Mickey Golf collection features apparel designed for the links but stylish enough to incorporate into your daily wardrobe. Part of the Disney Style Golf Collection, the new lineup includes shirts, sweaters and outerwear for adults, in sizes small to 3XL.

We’ve rounded up some of the best Mickey Golf collection pieces below. Worth noting: many of the pieces are selling quickly online, so we recommend adding to cart while your size is still in stock.

Mickey Mouse and Friends Golf Polo Shirt

This polo shirt features a retro-style print of Mickey, Donald Duck, Goofy and Pluto playing golf. We like the green and navy trim around the cuffs and collar, as well as the comfortable cotton blend material, which includes a touch of elastane for stretch. It’s flexible enough to wear as you tee off, but pulled together enough to wear to dinner too.

Mickey Mouse Plaid Golf Shorts

These relaxed fit golf shorts feature an all-over plaid design and a Mickey “M” crest on the sides. Look closely and you’ll see tiny Mickey logos baked into the green and navy print. These shorts also feature a perforated, breathable material, elastic waistband and interior lining, making them great for all sports — not just golf.

Mickey Mouse Argyle Golf Vest

We love this vintage-inspired argyle vest, which features tiny Mickey faces interwoven into the classic diamond-check pattern. An embroidered Mickey appliqué sits on the on chest. The striped trim on the collar, arm holes and hem adds a touch of prep.

Donald Duck Woven Golf Shirt

This Donald Duck golf shirt is made from a lightweight and breathable viscose material that sits silky smooth against the skin. The front features Donald ready for a game of golf, while the back reveals a slightly more agitated Donald yelling out ‘Aw phooey!” as he breaks his golf club while teeing off.

Mickey Mouse and Friends Plaid Golf Zip Jacket

Stay warm during early mornings (and late evenings) on the green with this Mickey and Friends golf jacket. It features the same plaid pattern as the shorts above, with an appliqué on the chest of Mickey and Pluto playing golf. Other nods to Disney abound, with a Mickey patch on the right sleeve and a tiny Mickey golf crest tag on bottom hem.

Mickey Mouse and Friends Golf Pullover Sweatshirt

This Mickey Golf sweatshirt features a ton of Disney characters and motifs, with Mickey, Donald, Goofy, and Pluto represented on the front. We like the old-school design, which is reminiscent of classic clubhouse uniforms and private school pullovers. This one is selling out, so add to cart while it’s still in stock!

The latest Disney drop also includes a special 75th anniversary Cinderella collection, and new merch from beloved franchises like Winnie the Pooh, Minnie Mouse and Moana. See the latest arrivals at DisneyStore.com.
